booster_content_gems_price_bubble.message:
Gems-Price:
This shows you how much gems you need to craft this booster-pack.

booster_content_gems_cost_bubble2.message:
Gems would cost,
depending on current market-price
(lowest sell-order)

booster_content_buy_bubble.message:
Buy-Orders (Total):
This category show the sum of all Buy-Orders, of all cards for this booster-pack.

booster_content_sell_bubble.message:
Sell-Orders (Total):
This category show the sum of all Sell-Orders, of all cards for this booster-pack.

booster_content_booster_price_bubble.message:
Booster-Pack-Preis:
This shows the lowest sell-order
for this booster-pack.

booster_content_card_sell_bubble.message:
Card-Price (Sell):
This category show all card-prices from low to high.

green - is the lowest card-price
yellow - is the average card-price
red - is the highest card-price

Taxes are already substracted.

Booster-Packs have 3 cards and the sum of all cards
would be:

booster_content_card_buy_bubble.message:
Card-Price (Buy):
This category show all card-prices from low to high.

green - is the lowest card-price
yellow - is the average card-price
red - is the highest card-price

Taxes are already substracted.

Booster-Packs have 3 cards and the sum of all cards
would be:

inventory_multi_items_sell.description: needs one white-space in front of it

inventory_msg_sending_trades.message: We got the needed Card-Data. Sending trades now.

inventory_msg_not_enough_csgo.message: You don't have enough CS:GO-Cards to craft badges or they can't be traded.

inventory_send_cards_to_bots_dialog.message: Are you sure you want to continue? You can only abort this step by reloading the extension or closing your browser. Make sure every users Badges are up-to-date. This action will send CS:GO-Cards to every bot who doesn't have the Level 5-Badge for CS:GO. It will also calculate how much cards every user needs. Press OK if you want to continue.

inventory_confirm_bulk_gifting.message: Are you sure you want to continue? You can only abort this step by reloading the page. Make sure your database is up-to-date and every game is correctly listed for every of your bots. Gifts only get send to bots which don't own one or more of the games included in the gift

inventory_alert_no_gift.message: You need to select a game first!

background_progress_csgo_cards_finished.message: Finished! You can accept the trades for your bots now.

login_msg_cookie_exists.message: Cookie for this user exists in database and was set.

login_msg_cookies_deleted.message: Cookies deleted and missing cookies updated.

background_bulk_gift_error1.message: Looks like this gift was sent before or your sessionID expired.

background_bulk_gift_error2.message: Looks like you are using an old sessionID

background_bulk_gift_error3.message: Looks like you tried to send a gift to yourself. gg wp

background_start_sending_gifts_msg.message: Processed all Data. We can start sending Gifts now.

background_gifts_bulk_already_owned.message: All of your bots own this game already.

background_gifts_bulk_appids_wrong.message: Theres a problem with getting the correct appids.

background_csgo_bulk_already_badge.message: All users already own the CS:GO-Badge on Level 5 or are Level 8.

background_error_too_many_attempts.message: Error: Too many attempts while getting market-prices for items.

background_error_not_logged_in.message: You should log in to your steam-account -> abort process. XHR-Error:

background_error_steam_server.message: Theres a problem with Steam-Server and/or its API. XHR-Error:

background_bulksell_user_stopped.message: Process was stopped by user or retry-limit was reached (due to Steam-Servers being unavailable).

background_bulksell_user_stopped_msg.message: Getting Item-Prices process stopped by user.

background_bulksell_listing_msg.message: We should be done now. Confirmations may run in background.

webworker_bot_games_cant_find.message: Can't find appids. There could be a problem with Steam WebAPI or to fast requests.

confirmation_2fa_trades_saved.message: Notifications for Trades - saved to LocalStorage

confirmation_2fa_confirm_empty.message: List of confirmations appears empty, there is nothing to confirm.

confirmation_2fa_wrong_key_time.message: Confirmation-Key or Server-Time is wrong. Retrying ...

background_error_master_or_stalled.message: Master-Account not logged in or stalled connection.

background_error_missing_market_noti.message: Could not get notification-data for market and trade.

background_error_srsly.message: There could a serious problem with confirmation-key or server-time. Max retry-limit was reached and we reset it now.

background_user_is_bot_msg.message: User is a bot and trade gets accepted.

background_user_is_not_bot_msg.message: User isnt a bot and trade has to be accepted manually.

background_trades_not_master.message: Another account is logged in. It isnt your Master.

background_idb_db_blocked.message: Database-Store is blocked by other process

background_idb_export_json.message: If you click OK the whole table will be exported. Please look in your Standard Download-Folder for the created file. The Download could start silently.

steam_login_error_no_cookie.message: Sorry, there is no Cookie for this user in your Database. Steam will set a new Cookie with 30 Days Trade-Restriction.

steam_login_input_appid.message: You have to input the appid first for the free license you want to activate.

index_confirm_all.message: Are you sure you want to accept all confirmations?

index_decline_all.message: Are you sure you want to decline all confirmations?

index_confirm_no_items.message: There are no items to confirm.

index_confirm_one_item.message: Are you sure you want to confirm this item now?

index_listener_malformed.message: WARNING! Malformed request has been send.

index_first_time.message: You´re using this extension for the first time? Please set up a few settings to enjoy this extension with all its features.

index_table_import1.message: If you import your data, the table '
index_table_import1.description: space after and quote is needed

index_table_import2.message: ' gets cleared and your data deleted. Backup your data first! This step can not be undone. Press OK if you want to continue.
index_table_import2.description: space before and quote is needed

index_table_clear_table_msg.message: Are you sure you want to delete all your data? Backup your data first! This step can not be undone. Press OK if you want to continue.

index_table_get_owend_games_msg.message: This action can take a long time depending on how much bots you have. There must be minimal one User set up with Type Master and a valid SteamID or this will not work. This task will run in the background and won´t stop if you reload the extension-tab. If you want to start press OK.

index_table_get_owend_badges.message: Get Data of owned Badges and actual Level

index_table_get_owend_badges_msg.message: This action can take a long time depending on how much bots you have. There must be minimal one User set up with Type Master and a valid SteamID or this will not work. This task will run in the background and won´t stop if you reload the extension-tab. This action will get the data for CS:GO- / Community-Badge and also the actual level. If you want to start, press OK.

inventory_input_saved_err.message: There was an error saving your data.
